name: Spell Vector
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature is magically edited to copy and spread spell effects affecting it to any creature it touches. If the target uses a touch range attack or spell, strikes a creature in melee, shoves or drags a creature, or is the target of any of the prior actions, they copy all currently existing spell effects on them to the touched creature, except for this spell.

When the spell ends, all shared effects on other creatures also end.
